headline: CVS dispensed opioid drugs unlawfully in profit push, US suit alleges
summary: The pharmacy chain pressed staff to churn out prescriptions, ignoring red flags amid the US opioid epidemic, the DOJ claims. CVS decried the suit’s “false narrative.”
